title: Bank of China 3Q Net Profit Rose 5.6% On Year
text:
By Yi Wei Wong

Bank of China Ltd. (3988.HK) said its third-quarter net profit rose 5.6% on year due to gains in net interest income as well as fee and commission income.

Net profit in the September quarter was 49.80 billion yuan (US$7.05 billion), beating a consensus estimate of CNY47.90 billion provided by FactSet.

Net interest income in the quarter was CNY96.14 billion, compared with CNY91.86 billion in the same period last year, the country's fourth-largest lender by assets said in its earnings statement.

Bank of China reported that net interest margin for the first nine months of the year was 1.84%, a decline of 0.05 percentage point over the same period last year, mainly due to new interest rate rules by the Chinese government.

Third-quarter net fee income grew 3.5% on year to CNY21.05 billion, it said.
